alert.note: Alert for Giles; Lawrence (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 3:58PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lawrence and southern Giles Counties through 430 PM CST... At 358 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Lexington, or 17 miles southwest of Pulaski, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pulaski, Ardmore, Elkton, Minor Hill, Frankewing and Prospect. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
